metadata.name: Poetry in Women #1
metadata.description:
2222 piece mixed media art collection with an attitude stored as newest ERC-721A tokens on the Ethereum Blockchain. 

It is a present-day manifestation of NFT culture and language in a mixed-media format - the first of its kind! 

This female led collection is a symbiosis between crypto art, NFTs and the traditional art world. Transforming NFTs into something more meaningful. It creates a bridge between the world of technology and traditional art.

Created by Breznanikova & Kastro

Visit our collection website: [Poetry in Women](https://www.breznanikova.photography/poetry)
